'Knut' is a mathcore/sludgecore band from Geneva, Switzerland that formed in
1994. Early material was put out on Snuff Records, which was run by SÃ©verin and
Mounir. They are currently signed to Hydra Head Records, which is owned and
operated by Aaron Turner of Isis. In 2010, the band released their first new
studio album in more than five years.
